thread.section_title: Hotel Mademoiselle - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cosy hotel near Gard du Nord
thread.title_full: Cosy hotel near Gard du Nord - Review of Hotel Mademoiselle, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Frans B
title: Cosy hotel near Gard du Nord
text: We are always going to this Hotel when we go to Paris. It is friendly and you can reach all off Paris easily. The rooms are comfortable and clean. The service friendly. A nice and comfortable hotel. That it is close to Gard du Nord is a plus for us as we come often by Thalys, a short walk from here to the hotel.
